item.title: Virtual Trial Room
item.description:
Virtual Trial Room is one of my most successful projects. It is a browser based dressing room where you can digitally try out different clothes.

This project several awards-

  1. Champions, NSU Technovation Hackathon 2018, North South University
  2. Joint Runners Up, NSU Cybernauts, North South University Computer & Engineering Club (NSU CEC)
  3. Second Runners Up, Technival 2018, Khulna University of Engineering and Technology (KUET)
  4. Second Runners Up, Inter University Project Show, CSE Fest, Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET)

This project also got featured on BBC Click.

My talented friends who contributed to this project are:

  • Moumita Asad
  • Aquib Azmain

Technology used:

  • Python
  • Flask
  • OpenCV

item.title: Salimullah Hall Management System
item.description:
Salimullah Hall Management System is a web application to digitize the activities of Salimullah Hall, University of Dhaka. Our entire university batch contributed in developing this app in our final semester. Through the app the following activities can be done:

  • Student management
  • Employee management
  • Inventory management
  • Accounting
  • Residence management
  • User management

Technology used:

  • Python
  • Flask
  • Angular
  • MariaDB

item.title: ScanF - A web application security assessment too
item.description:
ScanF is a web application vulnerability assessment tool. It is aimed at assisting penetration testers to easily carry out XSS and SQLi attacks to search for vulnerabilities.

Technology used:

  • Python
  • Flask
  • Selenium
  • Vue

item.title: Showme - ICSE SCORE
item.description:
Showme is A web app that parses research papers and shows a citation graph. It was made for the SCORE competition in ICSE 2018 and it made to the final six. These wonderful members also contributed to the project:

  • Kishan Kumar Ganguly
  • Moumita Asad
  • Aquib Azmain

Technology used:

  • Python
  • Flask
  • Angular

item.title: 8-puzzle Solver
item.description: 8-puzzle solver using A* search algorithm, implemented in Java. This was a class assignment.

item.title: Syncer - A File Syncing Software for Desktop
item.description:
Syncer is a file syncing software for Desktop platforms. It is a dropbox clone made for our Software Project Lab-2 (SPL-2) course requirement. My wonderful teammate Moumita Asad was also involved in this project.

Technology used:

  • Java

item.title: Hostman - A PCAP analyzer
item.description:
Hostman is my first software project ever. It was done as a requirement for the sotware project lab-1 (SPL-1) course. It is a rudimentary implementation of a packet analyzer (similar to wireshark).

The project is completely written in C. No libraries were used.
